# RAGSPRO - AI & Web App Development Agency

Company: RAGSPRO
Website: https://ragspro.com
Description: RAGSPRO is a premium iOS & web app development agency in India helping startups build revenue-ready mobile apps, SaaS platforms, and AI-powered automation systems.

## Services
- iOS App Development (Swift, SwiftUI)
- Web App Development (React, Next.js, Node.js)
- SaaS Platform Development
- AI Automation & Chatbots
- MVP Development (20-day delivery)
- Startup Technology Consulting

## Founder
Name: Raghav Shah
Role: Founder & CEO
Profile: https://ragspro.com/raghav-shah

## Regions Served
- India (Primary: New Delhi, Bangalore, Mumbai)
- USA
- UK
- Canada
- Singapore
- Australia

## Technology Stack
Frontend: React, Next.js, SwiftUI, UIKit, Tailwind CSS
Backend: Node.js, Python, Firebase, Supabase
Database: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
Cloud: AWS, Vercel, Railway
AI/ML: OpenAI, Google Gemini, Claude, LangChain

## Notable Projects
- LAWAI: AI Legal Assistant (300+ users, $8K MRR)
- Lead Generator: B2B prospecting platform (400+ leads, 6.2% conversion)
- Subtitle Generator: AI video subtitles (250+ users, 200+ hours saved)
- E-commerce Platform: ₹30-40K monthly revenue, 180+ bookings
